data.name: kstidStyleLevelBasic
data.comment: show style level

data.comment: show style level

data.name: kstidStyleLevelAdvanced
data.comment: show style level

data.name: kstidStyleLevelExpert
data.comment: show style level

data.name: kstidOnlyAdditionsDetected
data.value: The only differences found in {0} were additions of entire sections. Do you want to see these additions?
data.comment: message to indicate that there are no differences when comparing two versions of a book

data.name: kstidNoDifferencesDetected
data.comment: message to indicate that there are no differences when comparing two versions of a book

data.name: kstidMergeProgress
data.comment: Progress dialog message displayed when calculating differences for the diff view

data.name: kstidCompareCaption
data.comment: Caption for the progress dialog when calculating differences

data.name: kstidOverwriteCaption
data.comment: Caption for the progress dialog when overwriting a book

data.name: kstidUnknown
data.comment: Symbol or short string representing an unknown number of unreviewed differences in the Merge Imported Scripture dialog box

data.name: kstidBookFilterCaption
data.comment: window caption for book filter

data.name: kstidUpdateVerseBridges
data.comment: window caption for updating verse bridges

data.name: kstidUpdateVerseBridgesInBook
data.comment: status text for progress dialog when updating verse bridges

data.name: kstidExportRtfProgress
data.comment: progress dialog text for exporting RTF scripture

data.name: kstidExportRtfKeyTerms
data.comment: progress dialog text for exporting RTF biblical terms

data.name: kstidExportUSFMProgress
data.comment: progress dialog text for exporting USFM scripture

data.name: kstidExportUSFMInterleavedLabel
data.comment: label add-on for interleaved control in exporting USFM scripture

data.name: kstidExportXmlProgress
data.value: Exporting to Open XML for Editing Scripture
data.comment: progress dialog title for exporting XML scripture

data.name: kstidExportBookStatus
data.comment: progress dialog book name template

data.name: kstidImportFilesUnavailable
data.value: No files are available for import.
data.comment: Message when there are no files to import

data.name: kstidUndoDeleteArchiveBook
data.comment: Message for undo/redo of deletion of a saved version of a book

data.name: kstidUndoDeleteArchive
data.comment: Message for undo/redo of deletion of an entire saved version

data.name: kstidBookAbbrevColHeader
data.comment: Used as column header for displaying the abbreviation of a Scripture book in multiple writing systems

data.name: kstidBookNameColHeader
data.comment: Used as column header for displaying the name of a Scripture book in multiple writing systems

data.name: kstidOxesExportDescription
data.comment: {0} is the project's name; {1} is a person's computer login name; {2} is the name of the current month; {3} is the day of the month; {4} is the year; and {5} is the current time

data.name: kstidOxesExportIntro
data.comment: {0} is the 3-letter book abbreviation. {1} is the intro. section heading.

data.name: kstidOxesExportRef
data.comment: {0} is the standardized Scripture range reference. {1} is a section heading.

data.name: kstidExportXHTML
data.comment: displayed as header text of the dialog

data.name: kstidExportPs
data.comment: displayed as header text of the dialog

data.name: kstidOverwriteCurrentWithSaved
data.value: Replace Range in Current with Saved Version
data.comment: Message for Undo/Redo of Overwriting current with saved version. (May just copy, if no current version of book.)

data.name: kstidProperties
data.comment: Menu item for bringing up Properties dialog (in Saved versions dialog)

data.name: kstidProtectedVersionCaption
data.comment: Message Box title for error message about trying to delete a protected version or a book contained in a protected version,

data.name: kstidCannotDeleteBookFromProtectedVersion
data.value: This version is protected. You must unprotect it in order to delete books from it.
data.comment: Message when attempting to delete a book from a protected saved version.

data.name: kstidCannotDeleteProtectedVersion
data.value: This version is protected. You must unprotect it in order to delete it.
data.comment: Message when attempting to delete a protected saved version.

data.name: kstidAlreadyExists
data.value: File {0} already exists. Do you want to replace it?
data.comment: {0} is the file pathname. Note the internal newline characters.

data.name: kstidExportOXES
data.value: Export Open XML for Editing Scripture
data.comment: message box caption

data.name: ksRedoDraftProperties
data.comment: Text for Redo menu item

data.name: ksUndoDraftProperties
data.comment: Text for Undo menu item

data.name: kstidAutoMerging
data.value: Replacing range of imported sections in current version of {0}...
data.comment: Progress dialog message displayed when replacing range in imported version.

data.name: kstidBrowseForBackupDir
data.comment: Label for FolderBrowserDialog

data.name: kstidBrowseForProjectsDir
data.comment: Label for FolderBrowserDialog
